title: Modern East Asia
description: Modern histories of China, Japan and Korea: great disruptions of modernity that have transformed these societies, common characteristics of modernity in East Asia, great differences between Chinese, Japanese and Korean histories, and the mutually constitutive nature of these East Asian histories. 4 lectures. Fulfills GE D5 except for History majors.
prerequisites: Completion of GE Area A and one course from Area D2 or D3
